main event: Multiple witnesses saw multicolored objects over the Central Airport of Mexico City in December 1957. The objects showed intelligent control and made no sound.
interesting points: The multicolored objects were described as hovering in the sky, some with bright lights beneath them, and some round with oscillatory motion.
The objects were observed to be distinct and very bright, indicating they were under intelligent control, and they made no sound.
The sketch on page 4 depicts tornado-like formations or vortices in the sky, labeled as UFO or UAP sightings.
Handwritten notes on page 5 describe the objects as being in bright colors and express the challenge of identifying their size and extraordinary nature.
The text on page 6 mentions concerns over security forces and the sighting being observed by Mexicans in the forest.
sighted object: multicolored objects showing intelligent control and making no sound
photographs: no the report does not include photographs
